profileAlternative.name: Rachael McClure
profileAlternative.headline: Product Counsel & DPO at MongoDB
profileAlternative.summary:
I am currently Product Counsel and Data Protection Officer at MongoDB. My work here focuses on product licensing, privacy, security, patents, trademarks, and export controls.

Prior to that, I spent six years at law firms in New York City focused on complex patent litigation, strategic intellectual property counseling, and technology transactions. I have attended three bench trials and worked on appeals to the Federal Circuit and Supreme Court. I have experience in all stages of patent litigation as well as in trade secret actions. In addition, I have experience drafting and negotiating IP and tech transactions and conducting IP due diligence.
